title: Topic 001 Question 124
body: You are working with protected health information (PHI) for an electronic health record system. The privacy officer is concerned that sensitive data is stored in the analytics system. You are tasked with anonymizing the sensitive data in a way that is not reversible. Also, the anonymized data should not preserve the character set and length. Which Google Cloud solution should you use?
options: Cloud Data Loss Prevention with deterministic encryption using AES-SIV
Cloud Data Loss Prevention with format-preserving encryption
Cloud Data Loss Prevention with cryptographic hashing
Cloud Data Loss Prevention with Cloud Key Management Service wrapped cryptographic keys
